Package xxl.core.io.converters

This package provides a larger collection of converters, e.g. a complete collection of converters for the primitive data types, strings and arrays of these types.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ArrayConverter<T> This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of objects.
AsciiConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Character objects as ASCII characters (the byte values representing the ASCII character).
AsciiStringConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write String objects as streams of ASCII characters (the byte values representing the ASCII characters).
BigDecimalConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write BigDecimal objects.
BooleanArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of boolean values.
BooleanConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Boolean objects.
ByteArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of byte values.
ByteArrayZipConverter This class provides a converter that converts a byte array into a zip compressed byte array representation and vice versa.
ByteConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Byte objects.
CharacterArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of char values.
CharacterConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Character objects.
ConvertableConverter<T extends Convertable> This class provides a converter that is able to read and write objects that implements the Convertable interface.
Converter<T> The class Converter is used for serializing objects that cannot implement the Convertable interface (e.g., predefined classes of the SDK).
Converters This class contains various methods connected to the serialization of objects.
DateConverter A Converter for object of type Date.
DoubleArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of double values.
DoubleConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Double objects.
FixedSizeBlockConverter<T> This class is useful if a converter reads until the end of the input stream, but the block used for storing the data is larger than the data.
FixedSizeConverter<T> This abstract class is a special kind of converter which serializes each object to the same number of bytes.
FloatArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of float values.
FloatConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Float objects.
IntegerArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of int values.
IntegerConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Integer objects.
LongArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of long values.
LongConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Long objects.
MapConverter<K,V> This class represents a converter for objects of type Map.
MeasuredConverter<T> This is a converter which can convert objects with a known maximal size.
MultiConverter<T> Converts an object with multiple convertable fields into a byte representation and vice versa.
SerializableConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write objects that implements the Serializable interface.
ShortArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of short values.
ShortConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Short objects.
SizeConverter<T> This abstract class represents a special kind of converter which provides a method which returns the size of an object in bytes before doing the serialization.
StringArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of String objects.
StringBufferConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write string buffers.
StringConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write String objects.
TemporalObjectConverter<T> This class provides a converter that is able to read and write time stamped objects.
TimeConverter A Converter for object of type Time.
TimeIntervalConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write time intervals.
TimestampConverter A Converter for object of type Timestamp.
UniformConverter<T> This class provides a wrapper for a converter that reads and writes uniform objects.
ZipConverter<T> This class provides a converter that compresses/decompresses everything what a different converter writes/reads.
 

Package xxl.core.io.converters Description

This package provides a larger collection of converters, e.g. a complete collection of converters for the primitive data types, strings and arrays of these types. Converters allow the control over every byte which is stored in secondary memory.
